unalcol.reflect.tag

Class TaggedObject<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.reflect.tag.TaggedObject<T>

  • public class TaggedObject<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    TaggedObject

    A tagged object (Object with a set of tags).

    Source code is available.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaggedObject

        public TaggedObject(T object)
        Creates a TaggedObject from the given object.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be tagged.

      • TaggedObject

        public TaggedObject(T object,
                    java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> tags,
                    boolean copyAllTags)
        Creates a TaggedObject from the given object.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be tagged.
        tags - Set of tags from which the tags (or just the TaggedMethods) will be copied
        copyAllTags - Defines if all tags are copied (true) or just the TaggedMethods (false)

    • Method Detail

      • removeNonTaggedMethods

        public void removeNonTaggedMethods()
        Removes all tag associated to this object that is not a TaggedMethod.

      • tags

        public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> tags()
        Gets the set of tags
        Returns:
        Tags associated to the object

      • set

        public void set(T object)
        Sets the object that is being tagged. Removes all the non TaggedMethods associated to this object.
        Parameters:
        object - Object that is being tagged.

      • object

        public T object()
        Gets the object that is being tagged.
        Returns:
        tagged object.

      • info

        public java.lang.Object info(java.lang.String key)
        Gets the information associated to a given tag. If the tag is a TaggedMethod it will be computed on this object.
        Parameters:
        key - Tag.
        Returns:
        The information associated to a given tag. If the tag is a TaggedMethod it will be computed on this object.

      • data

        public java.lang.Object data(java.lang.String key)
        Gets the actual tag data. If the the tag is a TaggedMethod it will return the TaggedMethod.
        Parameters:
        key - Tag.
        Returns:
        The actual tag data.

      • set

        public void set(java.lang.String key,
                java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the data associated to a tag.
        Parameters:
        key - Tag.
        value - Value associated to the given tag.
